# v1.1.0 Component Issues

## üî• Must-Have Components

### 1. Slider
- Issue: `[Component] Slider`
- Priority: Must-Have
- Effort: 2-3 hours
- Dependencies: `@radix-ui/react-slider`

### 2. Combobox/Autocomplete
- Issue: `[Component] Combobox`
- Priority: Must-Have
- Effort: 3-4 hours
- Dependencies: `cmdk` or `@radix-ui/react-combobox`

### 3. Alert/AlertDialog
- Issue: `[Component] Alert & AlertDialog`
- Priority: Must-Have
- Effort: 2-3 hours
- Dependencies: `@radix-ui/react-alert-dialog`

### 4. Command Palette
- Issue: `[Component] Command Palette`
- Priority: Must-Have
- Effort: 4-5 hours
- Dependencies: `cmdk`

### 5. Data Table Block
- Issue: `[Block] Data Table Block`
- Priority: Must-Have
- Effort: 4-5 hours
- Components: Table, Pagination, Checkbox

## ‚≠ê High Priority Components

### 6. Hover Card
- Issue: `[Component] Hover Card`
- Priority: High
- Effort: 2 hours
- Dependencies: `@radix-ui/react-hover-card`

### 7. Context Menu
- Issue: `[Component] Context Menu`
- Priority: High
- Effort: 2-3 hours
- Dependencies: `@radix-ui/react-context-menu`

### 8. Pagination
- Issue: `[Component] Pagination`
- Priority: High
- Effort: 2-3 hours
- Dependencies: None (custom)

### 9. Sheet/Sidebar
- Issue: `[Component] Sheet`
- Priority: High
- Effort: 2-3 hours
- Dependencies: `@radix-ui/react-dialog` (variant)

### 10. Navigation Menu
- Issue: `[Component] Navigation Menu`
- Priority: High
- Effort: 3-4 hours
- Dependencies: `@radix-ui/react-navigation-menu`

## üìã Medium Priority

### 11. Breadcrumbs
### 12. Carousel
### 13. Authentication Block
### 14. Pricing Table Block
### 15. Enhanced Tabs

## Creating Issues

Use the component template:
```
.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/component.md
```

Or create manually with the checklist from `COMPONENT_IMPLEMENTATION_GUIDE.md`.
